Air.DESCRIPTION: Orb: Deal #yPiercing damage to ALL enemies. Draw #b1 card the first #b3 times it is #yEvoked.

Afterlife.DESCRIPTION: You may play cards with #yAfterlife from your #yExhaust pile by #yPurging #b1 random #yNon-Afterlife card from your #yExhaust pile.

Aura.DESCRIPTION: Auras effects are automatically activated when a condition is met. These cards are not added to your draw pile at the start of battle.

Chaos.DESCRIPTION: Orb: Reduces the cost of a random card by #b1, and increases the cost of another random card by #b1.

Earth.DESCRIPTION: Orb: Gain #b2 [Thorns] the first #b3 times it is #yChanneled. It is #yEvoked after #b3 turns, dealing damage to random enemies.

Enchanted Armor.DESCRIPTION: For every #yAttack received, lose #b2 [Enchanted Armor] at the start of turn (max #b10 per turn). NL Take less damage from #yAttacks. NL Example: NL #b10 -> #g10%, #b25 -> #g20%, NL #b50 -> #g33%, #b100 -> #g50%

Fire.DESCRIPTION: Orb: Applies #yBurning and damages the highest health enemy.

Imitate.DESCRIPTION: #yImitating a card creates a #y0-Cost copy of it with #yPurge, and with base damage and #yBlock reduced to #b1.

Motivate.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of a random card in hand by 1 until played. Repeated N times.

Phasing.DESCRIPTION: You have a 35% chance to dodge each attack. Reduce this chance by 5% each turn. Stacking this power resets and delays the chance reduction by 1 turn.

Reload.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards, activate this effect that many times.

Ricochet.DESCRIPTION: Reduce a card's #yRicochet by #b1 for every turn that it is in the Exhaust pile. If it is at #b0 while in your Exhaust pile, activate this effect instead.

Soul.DESCRIPTION: When played or drawn, reduce #ySoul by #b1. If it is at #b0, #yExhaust this and add the specified card to your discard pile. #ySoul cannot be increased past its initial limit.

Support Damage.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to the enemy with the lowest HP at the end of each turn. Affected by damage modifiers.

Synergy.DESCRIPTION: A card #ySynergizes if the last card played this turn shares an #yAffinity color, with at least #b1 of the #b2 #yAffinities being #yLV2.

Water.DESCRIPTION: Orb: Add #yTemporary #yHP to this orb's #yEvoke while Channeled. Automatically #yEvoked after 3 turns, giving you #yTemporary #yHP. Heal #b2 HP the first time Water is #yEvoked this combat.

~Orb Core.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 orb. NL  NL Gain a bonus effect on your second Synergy each turn.
